channel.title: Missing French translation
channel.description:
Good evening friends,
Since I have BMS, I noticed that the French translation was not completely finished, it is partially finished!
I propose to you a French translation of the files missing, the translation is free you can modify it as you wish :grinning:
Hoping that this translation will be included in your future update !
Sincerely a fan of BMS :heart_eyes:
[>> Translation Available Here <<](https://perso.numericable.fr/ghost-ses/Ghost/Divers/Translate_FRENCH_BMS.rar)

item.title: Missing French translation
item.dc:creator: Leo
item.description:
Hello everyone

I do not know if the dev is looking at the messages, but good in doubt!

I updated the French translation with the missing text for the final version, all the French files have been updated.

Here are the files that have been updated,

bms_french.txt
bmsmp_french.txt
bootup_french.txt
closecaption_french.dat
closecaption_french.txt
credits_french.txt
crowbarcollective_french.txt
gameui_french.txt

For the download used the link of the 1st message

Read full topic
